coded_answer.p: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the musical show which the Circle ThreatreTheatre has presentedstagedis staging. I recently had a week's holiday in London and during my stay I camewent to your threatretheatre to see the "Over the Rainbow". My evening was very disappointing.
In the advertismentadvertisement, I had read that Danny Brook was starring but shehe was not. A different actor was playingperforming durringduringin the musical and he was very disappointing.
The play should starthave started at 19.30 but it started forty-five minutes later, we were waittingwaiting over there with outwithout doingto do anythinganything to do. We got very bored and tired.
After the show had finished, I went to the theatre restaurandrestaurant to havhave something to drink and get relaxedrelax but it was closed because the stuffstaff was on holiday.
Moreover the discounts were not available as you saysaid in the advertismentadvertisement and I paid Â£20.

I would like somea refandrefund because Itit was one of the worst evenings inof my life it if. If this matter doesis not solvesolvedresolved, I will gotake it further. I hope that it will be solvedresolved properly.
Unfortunately, Pat was not very good at keeping secrets. He and his friends got ininto trouble because of this habit, last week.

As they were watching T.VTV at Nick's house last Sunday, Sally noticed that their cutcat Curly was hurt, and she could not walk. The children were very unhappy and felt sorry aboutfor the pet. "Somebody had hurthurt her and had letleftleft her without help", Mourk said angrily. "We have to find him and make him pay for his action", Sally told them. EverybodEverybody agreed with her.

Suddenly Pat cried: "Oh my Lord, Bad Jon had donedid this. Yesterday, as I was arriving home, I saw him in your yard, Mack, he. He looked very satisfied, Curly was layinglying on the grass and..." "Yes, Ohoh Lord he did it because we wonbeat his team at football", Nick said. "He is so bad. We will make him pay. Hey, Listenlisten guys, we will take his dog which he loveloves very much and we will sell it to Sally who wants one. We will pay Curly's doctorvet with thesethisthe money that we will earngetget", Pat said.

Next morning, as Pat was going to school, he met Bad Jon. and toldsaid to him, "Hey, you. We know what you have done and your dog will be sold". Bad Jon understood and talked immediately to his father. who was the school minister about the children'children's plan. Of course they were punished.
